data.title: The Towering Inferno
data.meta_description: A restoration of the 1974 disaster classic!When a fire breaks out in a colossal San Francisco high-rise during the opening ceremony attended by a host of A-list guests, an overworked fire chief and the building’s architect must cooperate in a fast-paced struggle to save lives and subdue panic! data.text:
A restoration of the 1974 disaster classic!

When a fire breaks out in a colossal San Francisco high-rise during the opening ceremony attended by a host of A-list guests, an overworked fire chief and the building's architect must cooperate in a fast-paced struggle to save lives and subdue panic! Starring Steve McQueen, Paul Newman, Faye Dunaway, William Holden, Jennifer Jones and O.J. Simpson.

Director: John Guillermin

Run time: 165 mins

Format: DCP

In general, the Hollywood Theatre does not provide content advisories about the subject matter shown in our theatre. Films exhibited don’t necessarily reflect the views of the Hollywood Theatre. Information about content and age-appropriateness for specific films can be found on Common Sense Media and DoesTheDogDie.com.

Showtimes

Wednesday, September 18th
